meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dan McShane Molly Dahlberg Dave Leach Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6285.

div.div:
Dave Leach game 7.
Dan McShane game 1.

td.p: Dan McShane, a baseball game logger from West Islip, New York
Molly Dahlberg, a tutor and opera singer from Baton Rouge, Louisiana
Dave Leach, a software analyst from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 6-day cash winnings total $98,054)

tr.td: NEW MEXICO
(Alex: In honor of New Mexico celebrating its 100 years of statehood.)
SNAKES... WHY'D IT HAVE TO BE SNAKES?
DIRECTED & STARRED IN
FORM LETTERS
I WANT MY "BABY" BACK, "BABY" BACK
RIBS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'New Mexico\'s largest city, it was named for a viceroy of New Spain')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: New Mexico's largest city, it was named for a viceroy of New Spain

')

Molly

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Dave
Molly
Dan
WRITE NOW!
GAME DESCRIPTIONS
(Alex: We'll give you the description--you identify the game.)
MUSIC APPRECIATION
ON A FIRST-NAME BASIS
THE TIMES THEY ARE A-CHANGIN'
ANAGRAMMAR

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Where do we have measurements in the Bible? You have to think of Noah, perhaps.)
...
(Alex: [To Dave] [*]--yes--man--the distance from the elbow to the finger.)
MollyWhat is
$6,000
DaveWhat is a cubit?
$5,001
DanWhat is cubit?
$4,401
a cubit')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'The Hebrew word for this Biblical unit of measurement is Ammah, aptly meaning "elbow" or "forearm"')

tr.td: ANCIENT WEIGHTS & MEASURES
The Hebrew word for this Biblical unit of measurement is Ammah, aptly meaning "elbow" or "forearm"
Dave
Molly
Dan
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $18,801
Dave
Molly
Dan

19 R,
5 W
(including 2 DDs)

19 R,
2 W
(including 1 DD)
